query:
SELECT 
  c.id as kurs_id,
  c.title,
  t.id as thema_id,
  t.title as thema_titel,
  COUNT(q.id) as fragen_anzahl
FROM courses c
LEFT JOIN topics t ON c.id = t.courseId
LEFT JOIN questions q ON t.id = q.topicId
WHERE c.id = 8
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, t.id, t.title
ORDER BY t.orderIndex;

  COUNT(q.id) as fragen_anzahl

LEFT JOIN topics t ON c.id = t.courseId
LEFT JOIN questions q ON t.id = q.topicId
WHERE c.id = 8
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, t.id, t.title
